modules.description: Handles MTA filtering operations through libmilter, including message acceptance, rejection, and modification. Processes SMTP transaction events such as MAIL, RCPT, and DATA. Used to implement email spam filtering, content inspection, and policy enforcement in mail servers.

The module provides low-level control over milter communication, including socket setup, filter registration, and message manipulation, operating on milter contexts, SMTP messages, and headers. It enables operations like body replacement, message quarantining, and macro configuration during specific callback phases such as `eom` and `negotiate`, suitable for email filtering and message processing tasks.
